ide.frontend.classes

Class IDEPanel

  • java.lang.Object
    • java.awt.Component
      • java.awt.Container
        • javax.swing.JComponent
          • javax.swing.JPanel
            • ide.frontend.classes.IDEPanel
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    java.awt.image.ImageObserver, java.awt.MenuContainer, java.io.Serializable, java.util.Observer, javax.accessibility.Accessible

    public class IDEPanel
extends javax.swing.JPanel
implements java.util.Observer
    This class represents the panel on which blocks are placed and programs can be constructed.
    Author:
    Matthijs Kaminski && Axel Faes
    See Also:
    Serialized Form

      • pressedButton

        public void pressedButton(javax.swing.JButton b,
                          BlockModel m)
        If an inputEvent is pressed or the connection of a handler is pressed. This function will be invoked. The selected event/handlers is saved/changed. If an Event and handler is selected a connection is made and saved.
        Parameters:
        b - button that was pressed.
        m - model whose view contained the button that was pressed.
